Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Light it! Go!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: Contact! Get clear!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Form up on me. Kill the girl, but do not hit the objective! I have zero visibility, but someone dropped all of Alpha team.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: She has to be close! The other fireteams reported multiple contacts. We're on our own until they break through.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Breach and sweep, double time! Smoke grenades out as soon as it's down.
[Lara kills them all.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Oh no... Sulfur... This whole place could go up... got to hurry.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: She's got to still be here. Cover the exits. We have to retrieve that package.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Here! I fucking got her!
[Lara swims away.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: What about those things? Did we lose them?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: I wouldn't count on it. Find the Atlas, double time, and let's get the hell out of here.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: Got movement, here. What the f-
[The area above the water is on fire. Soldiers open fire on an unknown enemy.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: Contact! Multiple hostiles! Pull back! Defensive positions!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: They're above us! There!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: The Commander is down! Where's the fucking medic! Shit! They're here! Forget the girl, we have to pull back!
[Lara has to resurface because the air in her lungs, alas, is not endless.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Freeze! It's over. Hand over the Atla-

[Someone's piercing him with a sword. A soldier's body falls on Lara and presses her to the bottom. Lara fights hard for her life. After searching the soldier, she finds him a device for underwater breathing.]
[Lara resurfaces.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Okay, I think I see my exit... The statue's unstable. Looks like I'll have to use the Greek Fire... Just got to take out the remaining supports... Got to be more Greek Fire vessels I can use. Just got to find them... Got to find a Greek Fire vessel first... The crane is intact. It should still spin... Just one more support left...
[She solves the barrel puzzle, blows up the statue and crosses it to the other side.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: He was alive just a minute ago and...

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Oh fuck, they could be anywhere... we're trapped in here with them.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Stow it. Follow protocol and stay alert and we'll all make it out of here. Keep your open. Those things could come from any direction...
[Lara kills them and search the area.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Sulfur... this must have been where they prepared the raw ingredients for Greek Fire... Looks like I'll need another vessel... More Greek fire vessels... So many of them... That should clear the way a bit.
[When Lara crosses over to the other side, some ancient Egyptians notice her. They start shooting at Lara with flaming bows and she runs away.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Oh god! Oh no no no no! Ꭺhhh! Almost... almost... Oh shit! Jacob, I made it. I'm out.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: <via radio> Lara, thank God you're all right! Bring the Atlas to me in our observatory in the mountains.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm on my way.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <via radio> Lara! Lara are you up there?

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah, is that you?!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <via radio> <laughing> Little bird! You're alive, I knew it!

Speaker: Lara
Text: My god... Jonah, what are you doing here? Where are you?

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <via radio> I'm up here in some kind of fortress. You can thank Jacob... His people picked me up half-dead out on the tundra.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I can't believe you came after me!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <via radio> <laughing> Is that so hard to believe? I told you I got your back. I couldn't leave you out here alone.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm on my way up to you now. Don't go anywhere!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <via radio> Hadn't planned on it. Be careful out there.
[Lara finally leaves the caves.]

Speaker: Jacob’s Scout
Text: Lara! Glad to see you're still with us. The invaders are spread all over the valley, but we're pushing back where we can. If you can lend a hand, you're always welcome. We know we can trust you...
[Not paying much attention to the Scout, Lara uses a camp nearby.]

Speaker: Lara’s Journal
Text: Someone else was attacking Trinity in the darkness beneath the Cathedral. Could it be the Deathless Ones Sofia spoke of? And if so, what part do they have to play in all this? I have so many questions. But for now, I'm just relieved… Jonah's alive! I should have known he'd come looking for me.
[They meet a few meters from the camp. Lara hugs Johah.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: You look terrible. Terrible but... happy.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I was right, Jonah. Dad was right. The Divine Source is real! I wish he was here to see this.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: He'd be proud of you. Sofia told me what you've done for her people.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: Lara.

Speaker: Lara
Text: It's good to see you, Sofia.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: Jacob is waiting for you in the observatory.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: You actually found it. The founders of Kitezh were skilled craftsmen. They used this place to view the Atlas.

Speaker: Lara
Text: There...
[She puts the Atlas in a special hole for it.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah... try those chains.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Got it.
[Jonah raises a plate with Atlas on it to the sun. From a hole in the Atlas, a map image appears.]

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Incredible.

Speaker: Lara
Text: They must have used this to plan the construction of the city.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Like ancient blueprints.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Exactly. Everything radiates out from this point. That puts the center of the city under the lake. But... hmm, something's not right. The Cathedral... Where the Atlas was. It's on the wrong side of the map. Keep rotating it.
[Jonah's pulling the chain.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Stop! That's it. Kitezh isn't under the lake. It's under the glacier! The Divine Source must be there.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: How the hell are we going to get through all that ice?

Speaker: Lara
Text: Wait... This path here leads into the city. The cathedral is there... and the tower on the other side. That means the entrance to Kitezh must be... Here... The entrance to Kitezh... is here.
[Jacob smiles.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: You knew!

[The ceiling suddenly explodes. Lara’s thrown out the window and barely has time to grab the chain. Trinity soldiers come down to the room. Jonah grabs the Atlas and fights the heavily armed soldiers bare handed. One of the soldiers sees Lara.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: It's the target!

Speaker: Ana
Text: <via radio> Kill her!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Lara!
[He throws the soldier into an abyss.]

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Take my hand!
[Jonah’s grabbed by another soldier, straps a sling to him and goes up to the helicopter with him. Jonah screams.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Run!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Nooo!

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Lara.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Oh no.
[He’s badly injured.]

Speaker: Jacob
Text: We... We don't have much time. It won't be long till Trinity discovers the location of the Source.

Speaker: Lara
Text: But... I have to go after Jonah.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Even if it means giving up the truth you came here to find?

Speaker: Lara
Text: He risked his life to come here with me. I almost lost him once. Not again.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Then go. Do what you must.
[She leaves. We hear Lara’s voice offscreen.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: If Jonah is alive, they must be holding him in the old Soviet gulag. I never wanted to go back to that terrible place, but I can't leave him in Trinity's hands now.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah... Hold on... Sofia, are you there?

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara! Are you all right?

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm up by the old copper mill overlooking the Gulag. I'm about to go in after Jonah.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> I know the spot. We hid a stash a weapons near where we first attacked Trinity. You might find them useful.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Thank you, Sofia. I'll see you when I get out. Storm's coming in. Got to find shelter.
[She finds a small cave in the mountains and tries to get warm. We can hear her voice offscreen.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: I should never have doubted you, Dad.
[Lara is mentally moving back in time. She, a little girl, sits at the grave of her father, Lord Richard Croft (1953-2003).]

Speaker: Lara
Text: I wasn't there when you needed me most. I'm sorry. I'll make them see that you were right, all along. That you sought the truth. Not fairytales. I'll make it right, Dad. I promise.

Speaker: Ana
Text: Lara, it's time. Jonah's waiting.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah... Jonah must be up there somewhere.
[Meanwhile, Ana is looking at the map through the Atlas.]

Speaker: Ana
Text: Extraordinary. The Divine Source... it's in the center of the old city. ...buried beneath the ice!

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: Then it's time to move. I will notify the dig teams and prepare the transports.

Speaker: Ana
Text: Our men encountered the Deathless Ones in the archive... This will not be easy, brother.

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: The holy path is not meant to be easy.

Speaker: Ana
Text: Are the men aware of what they will face?

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: No. But they are prepared to fight and to die for the cause. That's all we need from them.

Speaker: Ana
Text: Konstantin... Now that we're so close to the end...

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: We've only just begun!

Speaker: Ana
Text: I'm afraid Trinity is just using us. What if they don't intend to let you keep the Source? We should prepare for--

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: No! You must have faith. I wasn't chosen by Trinity… Once the Source is mine, it won't matter what they want. I will lead God's immortal army and you... You shall live.
[We're going back to Lara.]

Speaker: Radio
Text: Konstantin, the prisoner is awake and ready for questioning.

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via radio> I'm on my way.
[Lara is walking through a snowy and icy forest.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Hmm... tracks.
[She notices some Trinity soldiers.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: Hold your fire... Just a deer.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Damn... they're everywhere.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Itchy trigger finger, sorry.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: You saw movement and reacted - I would have done the same.
[Lara quietly kills them.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: What happened?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 4
Text: Truck was too heavy... the bridge collapsed.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Everything's falling apart in this place.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 4
Text: Should we call it in?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Don't bother. Everyone's packing up and getting ready to move out.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 5
Text: This is your first field op for Trinity?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 6
Text: No, I was sent to help clean up the island. ...After Croft escaped.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 5
Text: Tough job. Heard you had to kill natives there, too.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 7
Text: What happened back there?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 8
Text: Bridge collapsed - looks like we're going to have fly out the rest of the cargo.
[Lara goes out to a big building that looks like an observatory. She takes a short break and reloads her weapon.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Ana must be close.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: Busy down here - what's going on?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: New orders - we're getting ready to move.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: We actually found it?
[Lara manages to defeat security and climb up the building where she finds Atlas. Next to the artifact, she sees a portable PC with a video of Jonah being tortured.]

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: This is becoming tiresome. Just give in to God's will!

Speaker: Jonah
Text: If you're gonna start preaching you -
[Lara is terrified. She runs out of the building.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah...
[It takes her two minutes to get to where John was tortured. She goes to his cell.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Shh...

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: Your loyalty to her is strong. I admire you. I do. But even my patience has limits. Tell me what you know. Now.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <laughing>

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jonah!
[Lara shoots at unbreakable glass and distracts Konstantin. Jonah attacks him and takes the gun.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Do it!
[She's trying to get in the room, but she's not doing it.]

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: Please... Please no...

Speaker: Lara
Text: Don't listen to him!

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: I was only doing what I believed was right -
[Distracting Jonah, Kontantin stabbed him.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: No!

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via radio> Sweep the cell blocks. Kill everyone.
[He leaves. Lara in a rush of senses breaks the glass with a fire extinguisher and runs to Jonah.]

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <weakly> I'm sorry. I should've killed him... but he was unarmed... I just couldn't...

Speaker: Lara
Text: Shhhh. You shouldn't have to. I am so sorry for getting you into this mess.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: <weakly> I thought I could keep up.

Speaker: Man
Text: They're coming. We're surrounded.

Speaker: Lara
Text: This time, I've got your back.

Speaker: Man
Text: He's dying. We don't have much time.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Bar the door.
[Lara comes out of the cabin, preparing to kill anyone who comes near.]

Speaker: Radio
Text: All units, respond! We've got to deal with her.

Speaker: Radio 2
Text: We're almost in position. Command, we are in position, and have visual on target.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Got to take them out.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: She's here! Got to take them out.

Speaker: Radio
Text: Confirmed, target acquired.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: Weapons free. Let's take her out.

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Oh shit! Close it! Lock her in! Move ! Move ! Move !

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Contact. Give me covering fire!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Clear the area... Opening fire!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: We're arriving on site, and have eyes on the target. Don't let her advance! We missed her! Pull back, pull back!
[The helicopter fires at Lara.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: What now?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: You're mine!

Speaker: Radio
Text: We have visual on the target! I repeat, we have visual on the target!
[Smoke grenades are rolling at Lara's feet.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Damn it!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Team 4, join with Leader, we'll take care of this one!

Speaker: Lara
Text: <coughing>

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Confirmed heat sig. Ready to engage!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 4
Text: <via radio> Roger! All engage!
[Fleeing the smoke, Lara jumps into the water.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Damn it! What the hell's going on! What happened!?

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: She just disappeared! It's gotta be the water!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: Eyes open, she can't stay under forever!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Surrounded... got to do this carefully.
[She gets out of the water and starts killing soldiers one by one.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 2
Text: We lost a man! She's below the ice! Cover the openings in the ice! Fire as soon as you see her!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier 3
Text: Where the hell is she?!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Just wait... let them to come to you. Last one...
[She runs back to the cabin where Jonah's lying.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Oh god, no! Jonah, Jonah?

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Lara...

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm here.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Lara, listen to me.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Try not to move.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: If I don't make it out of here...

Speaker: Lara
Text: Don't talk like that.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: ...Just listen. You can't blame yourself anymore. We all... make our own choices.

Speaker: Man
Text: His end is near...

Speaker: Lara
Text: No! He can't die.

Speaker: Man
Text: We can help him.

Speaker: Lara
Text: How?

Speaker: Man
Text: We must get him to the Observatory. To Jacob.

Speaker: Lara’s Thoughts
Text: Only Jacob can save Jonah now. We have to get him back to the observatory.
[We're moving on to Jacob.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jacob. He's dying.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Let me tend to him.
[He rubs his hands with a talc or something and starts reading the spell.]

Speaker: Jacob
Text: The Lord is your guardian, your protective shade at your right hand. The sun shall not harm you by day, nor moon by night. The Lord guard your soul from all evil. The Lord guard your going and coming from now to all time. Keep pressure on the wound. Prepare him.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jacob, you were shot... You are him, aren't you? The Deathless Prophet.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: I can feel pain. I can be hurt. I am human, save for a human ending.

Speaker: Lara
Text: And the Divine Source?

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Something I found long ago. It is real, and deeply powerful. But it is not divine.

Speaker: Lara
Text: So you've lied to them? For generations?

Speaker: Jacob
Text: I'm not proud of it. But I did it to protect them. I once used the Source to grant my armies their long lives. But it was a terrible mistake.

Speaker: Lara
Text: The ones I saw in the Archive.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: When enemies attacked Kitezh, the Deathless Ones brought the ice from the mountain down upon the city. Thousands were killed. They committed an atrocity to keep the power. And so will Trinity, but on a much larger scale.

Speaker: Lara
Text: That's not you... the man I've come to know would never harm his people.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Don't you see? All of this is my doing. And it must finally

Speaker: Sofia
Text: Father, they're on the move!

Speaker: Jacob
Text: They're going to brute force their way into the ice.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: Then we've already lost...

Speaker: Lara
Text: No! There has to be a way to stop them. Jacob... the map showed a secret entrance into the city.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: The Path of the Deathless. It's too dangerous.

Speaker: Lara
Text: We're running out of time. You know I can't give up now.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: If we can delay Trinity, that might just give us a chance.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: I will take our forces and attack them on the ice.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: Then it's time. Open the path. When you're ready, the entrance lies beneath the observatory. I will do what I can for your friend.
[Lara goes down the underground passage. After a little wander, she finds a place to make a fire.]

Speaker: Lara’s Journal
Text: I just have to catch my breath for a moment, this place… Kitezh... Jacob... the Deathless Ones. I've been running so fast for so long, I haven't stopped to acknowledge the simple fact that all of this is real. A part of me can't believe it. But I know Jacob was telling the truth… Whatever made him is here, and I'm going to find it before Trinity. I only wish Dad was alive to share in this discovery.
[Lara continues her journey in search of an ancient city...]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Amazing... Jacob, I'm heading in. What will I find down here?

Speaker: Jacob
Text: <via radio> My people haven't been down there since we sealed it off, centuries ago. But it should be safe, at least until you make it past the orrery.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Was it part of the observatory?

Speaker: Jacob
Text: <via radio> It was built by my astronomers, before the Deathless buried the old city. You'll need to use it to open the entrance to Kitezh.
[Lara finds a huge rotating mechanism that resembles a rough model of the universe.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: This is extraordinary. Let's see how this thing works... It's locked... just have to disengage the mechanism... Jacob's people were ahead of their time... Watch your step, Lara... Just got to make it to the top now... Got to time it just right... Patience, Lara... Now! A codex... This one speaks of the advanced archery skills developed in Byzantium...
[After learning the ancient "Archery for Dummies" Lara is mastering new archery techniques that help her climb up.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Bells... The old city is close.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara, we're on the mountain above the glacier.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Can you see Trinity?

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Yes, they're beginning their operation.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm entering the old city now... Listen Sofia, don't attack them too soon.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> We'll give it some time. All contact you again soon.
[Lara sneaks through the icy halls where crowds of immortals run.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: So many of them.
[Going down the rope, Lara crashes into an ice block and lands on the wall with a noise.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Shit!
[One of the immortals notices it. A fierce fight is about to begin.]

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara! They're going to break through the ice any minute.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Do you think you can stop them?

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> The best we can do is buy you some time. I'll see you on the other side.
[Deep in the glacier, Lara finds a majestic temple.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: The Chamber of Souls... The Divine Source has to be there. Looks like the way into the city center is through that gate...

Speaker: Lara’s Journal
Text: I don't know what I expected an immortal being to be like, but Jacob seems so... human. The things he must have seen over the years. All that experience and knowledge. It's difficult to fathom. And yet... he lied to his own people for generations. All for the sake of this secret. What wonders will be unlocked with the Divine Source? Will humans finally understand the true nature of the soul, or will it unlock some extraordinary new scientific discovery? One thing is certain... it's too important to allow Trinity to control.
[Lara descends to the temple.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Signal bells… I should take these out.
[When Lara comes to the temple gate, it suddenly closes. A trebuchet that stands in the distance shoots a fireball at her.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Shit! They're firing at me... Maybe I could use them to break through that gate.
[She runs to the trebuchet fighting off deathless and dodge the fireballs.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: I can use this to aim the trebuchet. That's good enough... now to fire. That did it! There's been some structural damage... the battle certainly took its toll... but most of the city is still standing... Almost there. The Chamber of Souls is through that gate. Just need to find another trebuchet.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> You don't have much time Lara. You must reach the Source before them.

Speaker: Lara
Text: There's nothing more you can do, get somewhere safe.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Not a chance. You need us as much as we need you. We survive together or we die alone. Now go.
[Lara finds the second trebuchet, but it’s damaged.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: I can still rotate the trebuchet... Maybe that will help me to get over there. Hmm, something's in the way. Got to be a way clear it. Hmm, I'm not strong enough. The rotation on the trebuchet should be enough to pull that rope. That worked! Now to take out that gate. Almost through... Just one more shot... This should balance the arm. The siege of Kitezh must have lasted for months... That lever on the bucket might close the draining mechanism. Hmm, it's not holding water. Too high. Yes, that did it! Archers... Got to take them out. Just have to aim this thing... Okay... the way is clear.

[Lara succeeds in destroying the outer gate, but the bridge behind them collapses. Lara runs forward as fast as she can. Behind the bridge there's a crowd of immortals waiting for her. She kills them all.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Yes!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara! Trinity has broken through! We can't-
[Lara is running to the temple. The war is raging everywere - Trinity soldiers are fighting with the immortals.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Oh no no n- Agh! Shit!

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: We're surrounded! Fall back to- Urgh!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Ana.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara! GET DOWN!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Sofia?! Where are you?

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> I see you Lara... We'll do whatever we can to support you from here.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Thank you Sofia. I'll take whatever help I can get...
[Lara's going forward, fighting Trinity soldiers.]

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara, you have to get to cover! We're about to fire, and you're out in the open!

Speaker: Lara
Text: I can't stop now. I'm close... I have to go through. Oh shit.
[Sofia shoots a rocket, killing a lot of enemies around Lara.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Thank you, Sofia. Hell of a shot...
[There's a helicopter flying up to Lara.]

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via helicopter loudspeaker> All squads!! have a visual on Croft! She must not be allowed into the Chamber of Souls!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Konstantin.
[The battle begins with the helicopter boss.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: I don't think you'll be able to hit him.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> We'll keep trying... We're reloading the trebuchet, hold on! The helicopter is too fast... we'll never be able to hit him.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Wait! I have an idea. If I shoot the fireball when it's near the chopper, the blast might hit it.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> I hope you're right. Give us the signal, we'll be ready.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm ready! Go!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> You heard her, launch!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Got you, you son of a bitch...

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via helicopter loudspeaker> Ahh, damn it! Send in a squad! Now! I want her dead!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara, we're under attack! We're trying to get rid of this son of a bitch!

Speaker: Lara
Text: You've got to get out of there!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> No! We're in this fight to the end.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Thank you, Sofia.

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Lara! He's headed back your way!

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via helicopter loudspeaker> I'm not done yet!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Give us time, Lara, we're reloading.

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via helicopter loudspeaker> You'd be better off throwing rocks...

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> We're ready when you are, Lara. Just give us the signal...

Speaker: Lara
Text: Got to use the Greek Fireballs... it's the only way. No luck... Once again, Sofia, get ready!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Give us time, Lara, we're reloading. We're loading up the trebuchet, hold on! It's ready! On your signal!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Fire!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Here it comes! My god... it worked! You did it!

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via helicopter loudspeakers> Let's finish this!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> We're reloading the trebuchet, hold on! It's ready! On your signal!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Fire!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> Give us time, Lara, we're reloading. Okay, we're ready! On your signal...

Speaker: Lara
Text: Now!

Speaker: Sofia
Text: <via radio> All right, here goes!

Speaker: Lara
Text: Ha! Yes!

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: <via helicopter loudspeakers> Ahhh!
[They both fall inside the temple. Survived Kontantin takes Lara's weapon and starts hunting for her.]

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: Just you and I now, Lara. You have no weapons! No allies! No hope! This place will become your tomb! Stay still! I can see you!
[Lara attacks him from behind, but Konstantin manages to block the attack. He clearly lost a lot of blood.]

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: NO! My destiny lies in the Chamber of Souls... I've come too close to be stopped now. There! Come out now! You know you're stronger than your father ever was.
[Lara goes out one-on-one with him and kills Konstantin with a knife in bloody QTE.]

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: This... This is not my destiny. I was meant for greatness!

Speaker: Lara
Text: This was never your destiny. Your sister let you believe that.

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: I did all... all of this... For her. Don't you walk away from me. Wait! Trinity killed your father!

Speaker: Lara
Text: No! You're lying.

Speaker: Konstantin
Text: He begged for his life! COME ON! DO IT!
[Lara turns around and finishes him with an arrow in the eye.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Burn in hell.
[She's running to the Chamber of Souls.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Ana! Stop! Your men are defeated. Your brother is dead.

Speaker: Ana
Text: No.
[She holds the Divine Source in her hands wrapped in a golden cloth.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: That is what Trinity has wrought. Death. And that's all they will ever bring. Give this up.

Speaker: Ana
Text: I gave up everything for this. I have no intention of giving it to Trinity. What about your father? You're dooming him to be mocked by history. How can you let this go? When you're so close.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm willing to make that sacrifice. I can't let you take it.

Speaker: Ana
Text: Think of the millions suffering and dying. We can save them. We can change the world. Together.

Speaker: Lara
Text: The cost is too high, Ana. The cost is too high, Ana. We aren't meant to live forever. Death is a part of life.

Speaker: Ana
Text: That's easy for you to say. You're not the one who's dying.

Speaker: Lara
Text: But this isn't about you. This is about humanity. About protecting what it means to be human.
[A soldier runs in.]

Speaker: Trinity Soldier
Text: They're coming! We're surrounded!
[Jacob comes up behind him and kills him.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jacob! Look out!
[Ana shoots Jacob in the chest.]

Speaker: Jacob
Text: The Source... ...is not meant for the world!
[Lara and Ana point guns at each other.]

Speaker: Ana
Text: This is your chance Lara. Everything I've done. Everything you've done. Another Croft doesn't have to die for this.

Speaker: Lara
Text: But I'm willing to.

Speaker: Ana
Text: Well I'm not.
[She shoots at approaching immortals, but they naturally don't give a shit about it.]

Speaker: Ana
Text: Please. I'm dying. This is my only hope.

Speaker: Lara
Text: Ana, no!
[She takes a rag off Divine Source. The richly decorated crystal inside pulls something blue out of Ana's face. Ana drops the crystal and Lara picks it up. She prepares to smash it.]

Speaker: Ana
Text: Nooo!
[Lara takes a look at Jacob.]

Speaker: Jacob
Text: It's okay.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm sorry.
[She smashes the crystal on the floor. The immortals are disappearing.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Jacob! Hold on...

Speaker: Jacob
Text: I've held on... ...for too long already.

Speaker: Lara
Text: You knew I'd destroy it.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: <weakly> In all my years... I've met few as extraordinary as you. <coughing> It's finally happening. My ending.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I'm sorry. All I wanted was to make a difference.

Speaker: Jacob
Text: You already have. ...you already have.
[It dissolves like sand carried away by the wind. We're moving to the Croft Mansion. Lara listens to the old tapes her father made.]

Speaker: Lord Croft
Text: My dearest Lara, I often think about how my father would turn over in his grave if he knew the shame I had brought upon our family's name. Croft... what does it even mean? I just hope you can make your own mark on this world someday. Remember that the extraordinary is in what we do not who we are.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: Destroying the Source was the right thing to do.

Speaker: Lara
Text: I still feel like I let him down.

Speaker: Jonah
Text: I think he would've made the same choice. Come on. You've got a plane to catch.
[Lara comes out of the room. Against the background of the dictaphone and the map lying on the table, we can hear her voice.]

Speaker: Lara’s Thoughts
Text: I had listened to his last tape a thousand times. But it's as if I was hearing my father's words only now. For the first time. It doesn't matter what choices he would have made… I have to make my own. The myth of Kitezh was real. There are secrets out there that can change the world, I need to find them. Not for my father, not for anyone else. Trinity is still out there and they're more powerful than ever imagined. I can stop them, I can make a difference. I can make the right difference.
[Credits.]
[Secret scene!]
[Lara meets Ana on top of some snowy mountain. Ana coughs very hard and barely moves her legs.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: Ana... You said 'another Croft doesn't have to die for this.' What did you mean by that?  You killed my father, didn't you?

Speaker: Ana
Text: Trinity ordered his execution. But... I couldn't do it.

Speaker: Lara
Text: You're lying.

Speaker: Ana
Text: I loved him.
[Some fucking sniper immediately kills her.]

Speaker: Lara
Text: No!

Speaker: Sniper
Text: It's done.

Speaker: Mysterious Voice
Text: <via radio> Good.

Speaker: Sniper
Text: What about Croft?

Speaker: Mysterious Voice
Text: <via radio> No. Not yet.
